code: import React,{useContext}from'react';import{NavLink}from'react-router-dom';import{AuthContext}from'../../context/auth-context';import{useNavigate}from'react-router-dom';import'./NavLinks.css';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";var NavLinks=function NavLinks(props){var navigate=useNavigate();var auth=useContext(AuthContext);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("ul",{className:"nav-links",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("li",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(NavLink,{end:true,to:"/",children:"ALL USERS"})}),auth.isLoggedIn&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("li",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(NavLink,{to:"/".concat(auth.userId,"/places"),children:"MY PLACES"})}),auth.isLoggedIn&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("li",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(NavLink,{to:"/places/new",children:"ADD PLACE"})}),!auth.isLoggedIn&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("li",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(NavLink,{to:"/auth",children:"AUTHENTICATE"})}),auth.isLoggedIn&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("li",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:function onClick(){auth.logout();navigate('/auth');},children:"LOGOUT"})})]});};export default NavLinks;
